metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38604 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In librt in the GNU C Library (aka glibc) through 2.34, sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/mq_notify.c mishandles certain NOTIFY_REMOVED data, leading to a NULL pointer dereference. NOTE: this vulnerability was introduced as a side effect of the CVE-2021-33574 fix.

notes.Note: sbeattie> 21.04 and earlier are not affected due to the fix for CVE-2021-33574 having not been introduced yet.

criterions.comment: glibc package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
